Posts.Content: Dec 6, 2007 08:25AM floridadwg wrote: thank you sooo much for the greetingÂ  it has beeen hard to talk about this. I was 100% positive and now feel I'm on the flip side again thanks
Posts.Title: rib pain floridadwg mrs_X_Sunneedazee

Posts.Content: floridadwg wrote: I had a masectomy 11/12/07 this was the third surgery in 30 days. all seems to be fine not much need for pain killers. The fear is caused from the ribs on the side of the surgery site not directly underneath but midway down. feels as if i have been punched there almost double up when touched there. has progressively gotten worse in the past week. still have some burning sensations under the scar and and occasional sharp pains.not wanting to be paranoid but how do we know if it is the bones? The sugeon felt he got it all this time and I don't see the oncologist for another week. I am scared this is all so new to me. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: rib pain floridadwg mrs_X_Sunneedazee
